Key Match Events: Sikandar Raza cleaned up Shubman Gill
Post-Match Reflections: This is the lowest total ever defended against India in a T20I
This was Zimbabwe's first win against India in any format since 2016
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's post T20 World Cup party hit a snag
This was India's second-string T20I line-up
Harare Sports Club was packed to the rafters
Others: Zimbabwe had the perfect start to their innings
Ravi Bishnoi was practically unplayable in the first half
A complete breakdown in communication saw Johnathan Campbell run out first ball
